content.rendered:
Directed by Daina Reid. Michelle MacLaren. Elisabeth Moss.

Written by Katrina Albright. Katrina Albright. Lauren Beukes. Silka Luisa. Silka Luisa. Naledi Jackson. Naledi Jackson. Alan Page. Alan Page. Alan Page. Kirsa Rein.

Cast  Wagner Moura( Dan ) . Phillipa Soo( Jin-Sook ) . Chris Chalk( Marcus ) . Amy Brenneman( Rachel ) . Jamie Bell( Harper ) . Erika Alexander( Abby ) . Alex Goodrich( Bertie ) . Sadieh Rifai( Lakshmi Awad ) . Christopher Meister( Clarence ) . Jason Wells( Ben ) . Jimmy Carrane( Senior Reporter ) . Jack Lancaster( Archival Assistant (Jack) ) . Christopher Denham( Leo Jenkins ) . Deanna Reed-Foster( Sheila ) . Kevin Gudahl( Detective Shawn Lynsky ) . Nate Burger( Gary ) . Marc Grapey( Howard ) . Madeline Baird( Summer Francis ) . Wendi Weber( Archival Supervisor ) . Tamsen Glaser( Karen Polachek ) . Madeline Brewer( Klara Meiser ) . Julian Obradors( Freddie ) . Ulrich Thomsen( Britta’s Husband ) . Karen Rodriguez( Julia Madrigal ) . Juan RamÃ­rez( Mr. Madrigal ) . Hanna Dworkin( Iris Laskaris ) . Richard Cotovsky( Neighbor ) . Shanessa Sweeney( Linda ) . Meighan Gerachis( Britta ) . Dee Dee Batteast( Teacher ) . Patrick Rooney( Theo ) . Daniel McEvilly( Guitarist (Hugo) ) . Brian Laesch( Michael Polacheck ) . Charlie Newton( Sports Reporter ) . Oswaldo Calderon( Bar Back ) . Wesley Truman Daniel( Private O’Brien ) . Torrey Hanson( Gordie ) . Liam Miller( Gas Alarm Soldier ) . Gary Houston( Otto ) . Brian Boland( Detective Samuels ) . Angela Morris( Neighbor ) . Don Forston( Arnold ) . Raymond Fox( Pedestrian ) . Al’Jaleel McGhee( Patient ) . Michael Herzovi( Warren ) . Gerard Dedera( American Priest ) . Jose M. Cervantes( Julia’s Cousin ) . Vasily Deris( Worker ) . Phil Ridarelli( Sketch Artist ) . Matthew Lunt( French Priest ) . Kirsten Fitzgerald( Nurse Josef ) . Charin Alvarez( Julia’s Aunt #1 ) . Michael B. Woods( Roland ) . Carter Shimp( Mike ) . Maizie Landfear( Girl ) . Julie Ramos( Julia’s Aunt #2 ) . David Anthony Bell( Frank ) . Angel Pedraza( Bodega Clerk ) . Mary Beth Burns( Susan ) . Pam Tierney( Lori ) . Liv Shine( Sam ) . Marcin Marszalek( Pawel Banik ) . Cory Goodrich( Vocalist ) . Scott Buechler( Landon ) . Christian Cisneros( Guitarist ) . Tory O. Davis( PAA ) . Andrew Kerr( Keyboardist ) . Amber Kelly( Drummer (Kitty) ) . Gabriel Gonzalez Greenman( Boy on Train ) . Chloe Baldwin( Door Woman ) . Ricardo Flores( Koki Bar (Bouncer) ) . Julitta Brecher( Babcia ) . Matthew Lucki( Traffic Cop ) . Bri Sudia( Hotel Maid (Natalie) ) . Elvis Garcia( Low Rent DJ ) . Mark Spates Smith( Union Rep ) . Benny Mora( Jaime ) . Thom Cox( Church Member ) . Lou Canellis( TV Reporter #1 ) . Gregory Linington( Stranger at Dan’s House ) . Dekyi Ronge( Female Guest ) . Samantha Chatman( TV Reporter #2 ) . Walter Coppage( TV Reporter #3 ) . Nick Vidal( Male Guest ) . John Norman Lasseter( Metro Reporter (John) ) . Mike Geraghty( Police Officer #1 (Herbert) ) . Andy McDermott( Police Officer #2 (Leslie) ) . Hans Dieter Wolff( Business owner (uncredited) ) . Giota Trakas( Koki Bar Goer (uncredited) ) . Magdalena Conway( Dolores (uncredited) ) . Michael McCracken( Reporter (uncredited) ) . Tony Domin/epo( Copy Editor (uncredited) ) . Rachel Lewis( The Well Congregation (uncredited) ) . Rebecca Guth( Victim (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Lauren Beukes. Marc Bienstock. Jennifer Davisson. Leonardo DiCaprio. Michael Hampton. Rebecca Hobbs. Naledi Jackson. Joshua Levey. Silka Luisa. Michelle MacLaren. Lindsey McManus. April Moore. Elisabeth Moss. Desmond Paes. Alan Page. Kirsa Rein. Emma Silvers.

Production Appian Way. Factory Underground. Love & Squalor Pictures.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
